content: is your hair a mess not anymore the hot mess headband is here to save you and your hair from a bad day add this cute little accessory to any outfit for a touch of color and cute the one-skein project is knit with wooly worsted merino yarn which is super soft and washable the hot mess headband will keep your ears warm and make you the snappiest girl on the street **tutorial ** get the full how-to and see all the steps to make this project on our blog go to blog > 1 *note a set of double-pointed needles is great for this project knit back and forth with two then use a third to work the cable in the middle * **measurements ** 3 wide 21 around stretches to fit 23-24 head **yarn ** ewe ewe yarns wooly worsted 95 yards 50g heavy worsted weight #4 1 skein 20 red poppy **needles ** us 8 5 0 mm knitting needles **supplies ** cable needle yarn needle **gauge ** 20 sts to 4 in stockinette stitch ------------------------------------- find the ewe ewe yarn to make this project local stockists and sign up for our newsletter on the linked website 2 2 http //www eweewe com
